website_summaries.verdict: Cleaning machine with efficient suction that works right out of the box.
pros: Clears under furniture without much fuss
cons: Plastic housing is not particularly durable

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME VACUUM
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Dust Devil vacuum and it has surpassed my expectations. It works incredible on hard flooring and light carpets. i.e. throw rugs, bathroom rugs. It is superb in sucking up dog fur as I have 2 German Shepherds. I love the attachments as they can clean high spots I can't reach and the attachments are great for cleaning blinds, curtains and tower fans. The vacuum and attachments are very user friendly. I honestly can not say enough wonderful things about this vacuum. Great purchase and definitely deserves 5 stars. Highly Recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: GSD LOVER

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum falls over easily, piece broken off :-(
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum cleaner is light and works pretty well. However, it does not stay upright and falls over easily. I am always having to lean it against something else, and sometimes, even that doesn't work. It fell onto the floor this week, and one of the pieces the cord winds around broke off. I've used the vac for less than two weeks, so this is really disappointing. If the manufacturer is not going to make a vacuum that stands up easily, then they should make sure it doesn't break easily.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: DIrt Devil
customer_reviews.text: Tried it for the first time today and I could not believe how much dust and dirt my old vacuum missed.The suction on it is great.
customer_reviews.author: BonnieWright

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace an older vaccuum for my grandmother. It came well packaged, was easy to put together with simple instructions and works well. It is replacing an older model of same brand but with a 12HP motor in the old one and this one we feel cleans better. Vaccummed and was surprised by what the larger vaccum had missed. Is lightweight and easy to move around for myself and also for my grandmother who is in her 70s. Easy to empty and the wand is also easy to detatch and use.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathon Argent

customer_reviews.title: Amazing vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Where do I start.. It is fantastic. I was shocked how powerful this small vacuum is. I had to empty the compartment 8 times during vacuuming my apartment and with my old one I only did twice. Huge difference. My carpet is so much cleaner. And this vacuum is so light. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Insanely disappointing. Can't clean with it.
customer_reviews.text: Total junk. I was recently disabled by an injury and can only use one hand. At the same time money is tight. I needed a new vacuum when my shark gave out. Big mistake choosing this one because I'm stuck with it and panicking. I can't afford to pay for another vacuum and I have pets. I don't know what I'll do. This vacuum is not picking hair up, it's moving it around on the carpet into little clumps that sit there. I've had to use the wand to try and clean the carpet and now I'm exhausted. I can't live like this. Take a gamble if you can afford to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Well, it sucks. It sucks all the dirt!
customer_reviews.text: I was using my roommates Dyson. She told me her vacuum cost her 300 dollars on black friday. It was a good vacuum but she left and took her vacuum with her. Not a problem. I bought this vacuum instead and omg it picks up far more than her Dyson and AND it's set up is pretty much the same which is super. I dig this vacuum so much and highly suggest it. Mine doesn't fall over either. Woot! Suck that dirt up, dirt devil!
customer_reviews.author: Candy Heishman

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, doesn't stand up, no suction settings
customer_reviews.text: Its not the lightest vacuum cleaner. It doesnt stand up on its own so you have to keep leaning it against things, and even then it keeps slipping and falling down. Very stupid idea to make a vacuum like this. The suction is ok, but you cant change the settings. The hose is short and awkwardly hangs on the the bottom constantly scraping the floor. I wouldn't recommend this at all, dont buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Auri

customer_reviews.title: Very tired vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I would buy this only if you have a very small apartment. This machine WILL NOT stand up right on it's own! If not supported by wall or something, must lean it against something. The cord is not long enough to go hall to room. One must unplug it to get to each room. Sucks up rugs/runners even though it is claimed not to. Easy to assemble though. I am returning it!
customer_reviews.author: Jim H

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and effective
customer_reviews.text: assembly was straight forward and it picks up dirt very well for s cheap vacuum. Solid purchase and works well. Pulls hair from animals up very well
customer_reviews.author: 86_Trans_Am

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be much easier to operate all parts of the vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I will be returning never had a chance to use. Was checking out everything tried for days to get into the bagless container to see how easy to change the filter when the time comes. It took over 4 days unable to twist it open had my daughter try after a good time later she was able to open. Now can not get the parts to twist back into the container checked the accompanying manual still unable. Would have returned earlier but had to deal with some medical issues.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Woods

customer_reviews.title: So bummed.
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a disposable income, so you understand how angry I am after this vacuum started smelling hot and ceased sucking after a little over a month of use. Which sucks because I have 3 cats and have to vacuum every few days or so. Now my floors desperately need vacuumed and I gotta figure out some way to buy a new one so I'm not living in squalor. So bummed. May as well have just flushed my 60 bucks down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: sai_justin

customer_reviews.title: great vacuum, grab earplugs
customer_reviews.text: i love the stretch handle, it cleans up better than any vacuum i have ever used, but boy is it loud, in a smaller room, i literally felt like my ears were bleeding. IT IS SO LOUD!!! i used it so now i dont know if i can return it. SOS silencer
customer_reviews.author: Jaycee clover

customer_reviews.title: It is a great vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this vacuum! The only thing is that the cord is not really long. The suction is great! I read previous reviews that it doesn’t stand up on its own. It does all you have to do is step on the shoe print on the left side and move the handle forward and it locks in place. It is lightweight which is a plus ! I am very pleased with this vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Faith Ratay

customer_reviews.title: I wish they still sold the older Dirt Devils
customer_reviews.text: I have a Dirt Devil vacuum I bought about 7 years ago. It's wonderful---I absolutely love it. So when I wanted a vacuum for the second floor of my house, I got this one. I don't love it---I don't even like it. The other vacuum is wonderful at cleaning---this one barely cleans. Also, with this vacuum, stuff gets stuck up around the filter and you either have to pull it out with your fingers or dismantle it. Dismantling it to clean out around the filter or to clean the filter is awful. It's a full-on wrestling match getting it both on and off. Definitely would not recommend this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: R. Barry

customer_reviews.title: the noise
customer_reviews.text: I thought the vacuum was the same as one I already had, but turned out to be a smaller version. However it does a good job of cleaning everything. My only complaint is the noise it makes while running. thank goodness I don't have a baby in the house. I know all vacuums make noise, but this little "chap" goes overboard.
customer_reviews.author: D. Geisler

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, the price i got it was 65$, The good: it’s vacumms with good power. The bad: it’s heavy, hard to move around and the cable is enogh for one small room so each room be prepared to stop the vacuum, detach and re-attach the cable, the nigh disappointment is, it is not getting under serfases, not under my bed even, let alone oven etc... I personally don’t mined the noice but if I had a dog it would have suffered from the noise. Bottom line is for better you would probably need to pay more.
customer_reviews.author: peri

customer_reviews.title: Worst Vacuum Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I have tried this vacuum for a few weeks now and I absolutely hate it. The chamber that removes and holds the dirt and filter is incredibly annoying to take apart and difficult to put back together again, eventually it will go back on but generally after you are already pissed off about it. It maneuvers fine but leaves deeper track marks than you would expect with very low suction, even when using the hose. It is just a terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Walker

customer_reviews.title: Super loud with high, screeching whine.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this. Suction is good but, not only is it flimsy-feeling and parts/cords/tubes don’t clock into place securely without a lot of effort, but, more importantly, it is incredibly loud and has a high-pitched screeching whine. My family couldn’t tolerate the noise or the high whine, and, consequently, wouldn’t use the vacuum. It is certainly inexpensive, and would probably do the job, but, as usual, you get what you paid for (or rather, don’t get what you didn’t pay for). Amazon was great about the return and I exchanged it for a more expensive vacuum with more features, and, hopefully, a more quiet motor.
customer_reviews.author: Lorian

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but not for very long.
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and sucks up dog hair with no problems. I use it on my couch 2x a week and there’s almost no hair on it after Update: lasted 10 months. Guess you get what you pay for. The hose completely snapped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Good Investment Dirt Devil
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty surprised of all the things that the Compact Bagless Dirt Devil Vacuum could do. - For those who have pets, like myself with a 2yr old pitty, it's geat in sucking up the furs. - For Light carpeting, throw rugs, curtains and even hardwood floors, it is just awesome. - You can definitely reach in high areas of your room (with the attachments) to get the spider webs. Putting together the attachments and vacuum was picture-easy..... I made a really good Investment in my Compact Bagless Dirt Devit for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I e-mailed Dirt Devil about receiving a defective product a week ago. The upright part of the vacuum cleaner will not stand upright but just falls down in the reclining position. No one has contacted me. I am extremely disappointed. I have been a loyal customer to Dirt Devil for years, but this is the last product I will buy from them.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia McKay

customer_reviews.title: Worked great the first couple of weeks. Has been nothing but trouble since.
customer_reviews.text: This was honestly one of the best vacuums I've ever used; up until the belt broke. It's been nothing but trouble ever since. The bottom/head of the vacuum is made of such cheap plastic; almost as if it's designed to break when you take it apart for servicing. I'm pretty sure the metal pin the belt wraps around broke too. So I'm pretty much out of luck on this. not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Suction, Well Worth the Price!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this little vacuum. So glad I read other reviews. Great suction. Lightweight. Ease of use. Its super easy to empty and change out the hose. Best vacuum I have owned but a third the price. I have used the $700 vacuums but why spend that much? I tried hoover @$150, shark @ $150. None were better than this $59 vac!! Highly recommend. My last DD lasted 7 years. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Mack

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Never been more disappointed in a product. Even from the get go, saw streaks on my dark blue carpet. It's like the brushes aren't low enough. Should have returned right away, but was so weary of recent returns on various items (shoes, stick vac). Am physically handicapped, and even with free return shipping, it is still quite difficult getting a large box to UPS or FedEx. Even with all filters and dust cup cleaned. At this point, I can see my beautiful blue Persian style carpet becoming dingier and dingier each day. If I could give zero stars, would do so.
customer_reviews.author: ellen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: All plastic, no front wheels, no height adjustment, no place to stick the cord so you have to hold it in your hand. It ruined my bathroom rug by sucking it up and rubber and fur was flying everywhere. No clicker thing to snap it into place or let down, you have to step on the front of it to get the handle down. I stand corrected, I found a place to hold up the cord a little behind the hose, very low.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine
customer_reviews.text: For the price you cant go wrong.It don’t matter if its a $500 or $69.00 the wife will have it destroyed in same amount of time
customer_reviews.author: Tornadojoe

customer_reviews.title: Broke-replaces-broke again- HASSLE
customer_reviews.text: The first vacuum I purchased had a strong electrical burning smell and began smoking the second time used. Returning and replacing was a breeze but the replacement vacuum is no longer functioning after maybe 10 uses on Berber carpet which is pretty flat. The bush no longer spins so the vacuum is picking nothing up. The suction is great for a small vacuum but the product seems to be very cheaply made. I don’t often write reviews but I’m thinking two new vacuums broken in less than two and a half months is no coincidence.
customer_reviews.author: Madame jeanne

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum is so awesome. It REALLY dose a good job.
customer_reviews.text: How I love this Vac. It is lightweight, has great suction, easy to use and saves you money by being able to wash the filter and empty the container of dust. It is so easy to use and I dearly love the long extension wand...I use it a lot. I am so totally satisfied with it. I had a Dirt Devil previous, that lasted for years so that made me get another one. I like being able to carry it all over the house....it's so light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Flo

customer_reviews.title: Worst vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money this vacuum doesn’t work. Used to make good products but this one was a failure. I would have to vacuum the same spot for over 3 min just to pick up some small amount of dirt off my rug. And it’s very noisy. I retired it and got a Brisell best vacuum ever.
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: Purchased less than 6 months ago and not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in April 2019. At first I thought it was great for the price, though it did feel pretty cheaply made. My boyfriend commented that it seemed like a toy vacuum. Very quickly the machine seemed to be very overwhelmed. Within a few months it seemed like it had lost a good amount of the sucking power, and started getting very warm when being used. Now, it gets downright hot and barely picks anything up, just moves it around. Yes, I've taken it apart and cleaned it. It's just a really low quality machine.
customer_reviews.author: Sally F

customer_reviews.title: Get the Dirt Devil Razor instead
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at the beginning of quarantine when my Dirt Devil Razor finally died after nearly a decade, and only used it once before driving out of state to stay with family. The first time, it made a clicking noise but worked well. Upon returning home, and using it an additional 3 times, the vacuum has deteriorated with each use. After this final use, the vacuum started making a whirring sound and spitting out a disgusting smell. Really high hopes for this vac, and Dirt Devil has always done right by me, but sadly let down.
customer_reviews.author: Madison T.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It works well at first but it clogs several times per use. It is very small, not even big enough to do a large living room without dumping. If you need it just for one bedroom or an office, it would be OK. It is easy to dump and also comes apart quickly and fairly easily to unclog. It gets VERY static-y and the handle has zapped me a few times. But, hey, it was cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Schobitz

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: There was an overwhelming burnt rubber smell as soon as i turned it on along with a horrible whinging noise. I tried to vacuum my hallway and noticed nothing was being picked up. I turned it off and read the manual to make sure it wasn't an operator error lol. When I went to try it again, it wouldn't come back on. 60 dollars down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: The top (main) arm broke off the second time I used it. Box was tossed so couldn’t return it. Other than not being able to use it anymore, it was an amazing vacuum the 1 1/2 times I used it. Not worth the money though. Invest in something a little more expensive and worth its value.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is much smaller than I had expected. And it’s very light weight. Has a good suction and I really don’t have and complaints with it so far. It’s still brand new and only been used a few times. The best feature in my opinion is that it goes from tile to carpet easily
customer_reviews.author: Raychyl Miller

customer_reviews.title: powerful + good quality for a great price
customer_reviews.text: after having two 300$ sharks die on me this is what i was looking for. i have a small home with three carpeted rooms and one rug. I use it every other day and am amazed how much dust my 1 yr old animal free home has 🤯 i do have 4 kids haha. My only complaint is the cord is a bit short. I have to unplug it a few times to get everything done. for the price and how light it is i don’t even care.
customer_reviews.author: A little bit of hippy

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this in Mid March and June 7th its broken. The roller is clear of debris and the belt it good yet it's smoking!!! Dragged it outside because I was afraid of a fire. Took off the bottom to see if perhaps something was stuck in there. Nope. Tried it again and it's still smoking. This is an inexpensive vacuum and the only thing I can do according to the owners manual is mail it back at my cost. Hardly worth the cost & the effort. I thought that being a Dirt Devil brand I would at least get a year or two out of it. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Chucky

customer_reviews.title: it works wonders and a great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift for my daughter in law, and she just loves it. Now she is constantly running it and well we laugh about it she has OCD and already cleans constantly and this was like a dream come true . I have one and knew it would be great for her and especially with two grandsons. It's and Dirt Devil and it changes the carpet to look new and cleans deep I'm happy with this purchase and it is a great quality
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Dirt Devil Delivers the Best Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent suction and accessories and even has a decent exhaust filter. I've been exceptionally satisfied with my two Dirt Devil vacuums over the past 10 years. There really is not a rational justification for the cost delta between this and brands like Dyson. I've used the high-dollar machines and they seem to be only marginally better than this machine which costs up to 8x less.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden West

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this vacuum on April 15, 2020, It now has died and today is Sept. 13, 2020. Less than six months of use and only used it about twice a week as I have only an 8x10 rug. I don't think it was worth what I paid and will NEVER buy another one of these pieces of china made JUNK!!
customer_reviews.author: David  Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Not convenient to use
customer_reviews.text: The handle of the cleaner becomes the extension wand and sometimes it did not easily loosen to be removed, sometimes two hands were needed on the locking ring so there was no hand left to hold the wand. The hose did not stay connected to the wand every time regardless of how carefully I seatedit and made sure that the "locking mechanism" was in place. I like the Dirt Devil for it's cleaning properties but this one is not easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: Well, the 15 year old behemoth Dyson had to move on. I purchased this little red machine hoping it was big enough strong enough. It did a great job out of the box. The dirt cup could be bigger but not a deal killer. The cord would be 6 to 8 feet longer but then I'm in an apartment. so I figured it out right quick. Suction power is certainly very adequate. Best of all is its compact size. How easily it is to maneuver around furniture and under the dining room table. That nimbleness will make me forget the behemoth very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: roy in cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Total garbage
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute worst vacuum ever. Literally no suction power. Hard to maneuver, the front sticks out making it hard to go under furniture. This went right back. Ohhh and the power cord is super short also.
customer_reviews.author: BuckDancer

customer_reviews.title: What a bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: It won't stand up without holding on to it. The hose pops out of the hole. The cord is stiff and gets tangled. The suction is modest. I made a mistake buying this and now own a piece of cheap plastic junk. Another stellar Amazon purchase. AVOID THIS!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont ever buy Dirt Devil!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Other than the fact it doesnt work well at all, constant hose clogs, the belt broke after a month and when I called the manufacturer for a replacement, sorry dont have those anymore. How the hell dont you carry the most important and flimsy piece of your worthless vacuum?
customer_reviews.author: Coughy

customer_reviews.title: Works well and has good suction
customer_reviews.text: We purchased for our mostly wool area rugs as well as our hardwood floors. It does a great job on the rugs and we have to empty the bit quite often. Really good suction. We have last years model and there have been significant upgrades. Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: ahalp

customer_reviews.title: Improper advertisement
customer_reviews.text: This unit functions as expected from Dirt Devil vaccum cleaners. It's just that is advetized incorrectly as the "Vac-+-Dust Floor Tool" is missing from the package. The company web site does not even acknowledge this vaccum cleaners model number so you don't even have the option to purchase it !!!!
customer_reviews.author: TJ49

customer_reviews.title: Good size, good power, easy empty cannister.
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of this upright vac. Nothing is wrong except that the cord isn’t long enough. My house is small and the vacuum manuevers well with plenty of power and suction. I just can’t give it 5 stars because it needs an extension cord.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Started smoking
customer_reviews.text: Purchased right before Christmas 2019 and as of April 4th, 2020 the motor is smoking to the point I'm scared to use it. I thought maybe the filters just needed a good cleaning so I took everything apart and cleaned them very well. After the filters dried I put them back in the vacuum and was using the hose attachment when I looked over and the thing was smoking like crazy. I had a Dirt Devil years ago and loved it which is why I purchased this one. That was a mistake as this one is hard to push around the carpet and after a whopping 3.5 months it's basically useless.
customer_reviews.author: Blair Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clog but easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I’m stuck between giving a 3 or a 4 star review. It’s a good vacuum. Has good suction, not too bulky and I really like the removable hose. It has a filter that you can take out and clean but unfortunately, the placement of it makes it easy to clog. I do like that it’s easy to clean and remove obstruction so I’ll give it a 4.
customer_reviews.author: iEdwin00

customer_reviews.title: Great for stairs. Light. Inexpensive. Loud.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight. Easy to use. Just wide enough for carpeted staircases. Good suction. The hand tools are conveniently designed to simply pull out of the holder and put it back as is, instead of having to reassemble the tools. Inexpensive. Cons: Loud!
customer_reviews.author: DIYgal

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum, well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this was the first vacuum I purchased since being an adult. I had one of those little ones without rollers and thought it was doing a good job, but during covid-19 quarantine I realized how dirty my carpets actually were. I bought this vacuum and have used it once and am so thrilled with the results. My carpets look amazing, the suction it great, and it leaves trails where I’ve vacuumed that make me think the suction is killer. Really easy to dump the container when your done too. Great vacuum all around.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore D.

customer_reviews.title: Quick cleanups.
customer_reviews.text: This is as expected. It will not replace a full upright but works just fine. I wanted a lightweight vac with a hose. I’m disappointed that wheels leave black marks in my kitchen floor. Great for light cleanups and rugs but will not keep carpet in good shape long term.
customer_reviews.author: Pastamama

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight vacuum
customer_reviews.text: It is so light to carry it up and down the stairs. The cord is to short so I use a 9' extension cord with it. The wands extension won't stay connected. The vacuum itself has great power. I bought. 1 for my elderly mother, she loves it. Her other one was too heavy for her.
customer_reviews.author: J. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst vacuum I’ve ever had. Takes forever and does a half a** job. Spend a little more on something, ANYTHING better. Save your money on this junk. PS I never write bad reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Rosario

customer_reviews.title: No assembly and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum was the best I have bought, Little assembly required and easy to attach handle. It was lightweight with a lot of suction. I loved it being bag-less. I was able to empty the dirt cup, wash it and re-insert with little effort
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia J Koehler

customer_reviews.title: I was very impressed with this little vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I waited a few months before I gave this review so I could see if it would stand up to my twice weekly use. I must say I cannot complain about a single thing. It is so light I can control it with one hand.....it picks up EVERYTHING on my bare floors and on my low pile rugs...... no bags and easy to empty the canister...people have complained that it is loud but to me it is no louder than some other vacuums that I have used in the past. The cord is a bit short but I personally do not find it a hassle to unplug from room to room. I would recommend this little super vac any day!
customer_reviews.author: camille hosein

customer_reviews.title: Too Light Weight and short cord/ Buyers Remorse!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have looked at this model at a store. I would have never bought this model had I seen it before buying! Guess I'm stuck with it now. The extra long cord is shorter than the last Dirt Devil I owned and the motor doesn't seem as powerful! The filter unit is 3 to 4 steps longer to clean versus the previous model too. The previous model was comparable priced 25 years ago! Oh well, live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: Should have shopped at a store for vacuum

customer_reviews.title: Will do for now
customer_reviews.text: I needed a lighter weight vacuum for my kids to use for their chores. I use my heavier weight vacuum for deep cleaning. I like that it easily goes from hard floors to carpet, but they complain that dirt kicks back at them when they are vacuuming hard floors. It will do for now.
customer_reviews.author: BoothFamily

customer_reviews.title: A good vacuum that doesn't pick up
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't work. It doesn't pick up from the carpet. You use it and from 10 items, it picks 3. Then you pass a mop and the carpet you can see dirt jumping. So it doesn't work. Need a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle P

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly well or at least having a clear dust container to see everything it picks up makes you feel like your doing a good job cleaning. Only reason this does not get a 5 star is because there is no way to turn of the brush to clean hard floors.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Belcher

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something compact and lightweight but with good suction and this did the job. It came assembled except the tube which was easy to insert. I have hard floors with area rugs and this vacuum picked up so much dirt! I was shocked! It also picked up the floors. The only drawback is this vacuum does not lock in the upright position or I have not figured it out. I also removed and dumped the cup with ease. Had book in the box. I recommend for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Fully recommend! Best vacuum I’ve had in years
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing!!!! I never realized how much my old vacuum (bissel) wasn’t picking up. This picked up sooooo much the first time. I have 5 animals & this vacuums the best vacuum I’ve had in years!!
customer_reviews.author: zealiah

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 months, only used 10 times
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum 3 months ago & used it about 10 times because I have another vacuum as well. While using it today the hose broke off from the plastic piece that fits into the base & the handle. It worked ok up till this point. But not worth the money even thought its not expensive I was hoping to get at least a good year out of it before it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Broke within minutes
customer_reviews.text: The first time I tried to use this, it worked for about 45 seconds, then just shut off. I checked the entire thing. There was no jam and the chamber wasn't even a quarter full. I sent it back for a refund, but Amazon gave me a gift card instead. I'm extremely annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: S. Midolo

customer_reviews.title: Dirt Devil
customer_reviews.text: Dirt Devil Endura Reach Upright Bagless Vacuum Cleaner... Stopped working for no reason before it was even 8 months old
customer_reviews.author: Sue W

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know how dirty things got until I used this machine. Would definitely say Yes to this vacuum. Nice that the extra long wand can get into tight places as well as the wall/ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Versatile floor materials, light weight
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good vacuum for the price! Was a bit confusing to assemble and I’m still confused where/how the tube is supposed to sit on the back...works well to shlep around our 2100sqft home and even wasn’t bad to maneuver up the stairs. Cleans well on hard wood, tile, and shag rugs!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Clemmens

customer_reviews.title: The best machine for an apartment or small room on the market
customer_reviews.text: There isn't anything this machine doesn't have in convenience, forethought, durability, and innovation. It's everything you need, and they knew it. The simplicity and great quality happen at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Marcella Ross

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Wanted very much to like this product. It will only stand upright when in the closet. When you are trying to clean using the tools and wand the thing falls over, and over, and over. Has good power but unless you are on carpet this thing is awful to use. Bad on floors. Over all I hate it! Sorry I bought it. Do the people that design these things actually try to use them? If only it could lock and stand upright without falling over. A real pain to use.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Ann Meiner

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the money arrived quickly
customer_reviews.text: Strong, and I love that there is no bag to change, or not be able to find. They always quit selling the brand and style you bought anyways, so this set-up saves you from that whole mess. Has a lot of power, I used it out in the garage a few times even. Good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hutter

customer_reviews.title: Very nice vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheap vacuum, but is better than many more expensive models.. It works great on carpet and hardwood floors and there are no bags to change. Just empty the dirt catcher when full and wash or change the filter occasionally. Plus, it is very lightweight. It does have a rather short power cord, so I recommend a 10 or 15 foot heavy duty extension cord to compensate.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great, especially for the price! Very light, so vacuuming steps is much easier now. Also, it made me realize how awful my other vacuum was. I used it the day before getting the new one and then used the new one and it picked up a lot more than I expected! Yes, I've only had it 24 hours and have only used it twice, but so far I'm very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: very poor suction when transitioning from entrance carpets to hard surface floors
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this vacuum because it said it transitioned from carpet to floors easily without loosing suction. We are cleaning a high traffic office and wanted the ease of being able to vacuum hard surface floors and entrance rugs with the same machine. what we have found is that after using the vacuum for the second time it will not pick up very well from the entrance rugs. it does ok on the hard surface floors but we are very disappointed on the amount that is left behind on the rugs. there is no adjustment to get it closer to the rugs so the suction just isn't there. very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: mms inc

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The hose attachments aren’t well fitted. They fall out. So if you are using the handle to vacuum cobwebs from the ceiling the hose will fall right out. You have to unplug the hose anytime you want to switch from the regular vacuum to the handle. The head of the vacuum only has one setting. You can’t adjust based on carpet depth. The tip attachment for the hand is the wand and brush in one. Can be frustrating if you want to get into a deep space, it’s not possible. It is easy to clean and has powerful suction as long as you keep it less than half full.
customer_reviews.author: Mary blass

customer_reviews.title: Warning : Burning smell overheating
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used this time a handful of times since purchase and it hugely malfunctioned. It’s overheating and there’s a terrible smell of burning plastic. Very dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: We didn’t have a vacuum cleaner at home, this baby made all the difference. It’s great for hard wood floors, tiles, laminate and carpets, easily moves between surfaces. Attachments are greats for hard to reach spots, corners and along walls etc.
customer_reviews.author: Nitasha Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Good Suction...Very Noisy
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is an excellent vacuum. picks up well from both floor and carpet and the extension is a good feature. It is very noisy not just from the suction but from the brush head I think.
customer_reviews.author: DMAdam47

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vacuum for a great price! It does the job and is light and easy to maneuver. It also is small enough to reach places my old clunky vacuum couldn’t. The only complaint is that the cord is a bit short.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small Apartment: Yes.  Home owner: NO
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect for a small apartment or cluttered unorganized narrow areas. Has no floor height adjuster. The crevice tool is awkward to use, it’s short, not angled properly, and frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: The Schwartz aka Swarleezy

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy Dust Buster, takes the pain out of cleaning!!
customer_reviews.text: This dust buster is so maneuverable and easy, I love it!! Easy to clean and who would believe something this inexpensive would work as well as it does!?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: Six months later and it is falling apart. The hose came out of the receptical. It threads into the plastic connection and looks like it needs some glue or it will continue to come loose. I expected better fro Dirt Devil
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Heller

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Works great for small areas, the cord isn't very long. I do have to use 3 different outlets for my master bedroom to clean the whole room. It doesn't swivel or turn very well but for the price it's ok. It gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Love Tayviaa

customer_reviews.title: Hose issues
customer_reviews.text: It worked great the first few times and I was happy with what I got for the price. There’s one flaw that makes a big difference for me, the hose clip where it attaches to the vacuum became loose. The design and plastic are cheap and not very sturdy in this area and what happens is the loose fit allows air flow and the vacuum loses suction. I thought about just duct taping it but then I can’t use the hose at all.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I have had no issues with this little vac. It gets the job done for me, i have had to unblock it a couple times, but thats because my dog chews toys up and the little vac sucks them up. Will update if it changes.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is very lightweight! I love machine! I needed cheep, and efficient. that is what I got. I find the cord to be much shorter than I am used to, but that is easy to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Hope S.

customer_reviews.title: Great value vacuum
customer_reviews.text: It's a heavy vacuum and also happens to be loud. However, it cleans better than the average $50-80 dollar vacuum. I got it for my 90 year old grandma so she isn't bothered by the noise as much.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum (doesn't) suck
customer_reviews.text: No way to change height for carpet and apparently my carpet is too short for the vacuum to work properly. I've gone over the same patch multiple times, but this doesn't pick up even large pieces. I've tried checking filters and all connections, but essentially this vacuum takes three times the amount of effort and time to do what my old machine could do in one pass. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: Used it the first time and last time, it is terrible at suction, all it does it throw dirt and hair off to the sides. I bought this for my office and it just does NOT WORK! Oh well, you get what you pay for. Returning this item ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: Sting

customer_reviews.title: CLEANS AWSOME, EVEN WITH PETS!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome , picks up like crazy! You have to shut off and put in position to lock for upright! Lightweight, gets in those cracks! I have several dogs, picked up their hair easily. Great vacuum, price even better!
customer_reviews.author: michelle kasprzyk

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to say I thought this would like my last Dirt Devil, which I bought reconditioned from a Big Lots. Unfortunately this is plastic and I have to hunch over just to move the vacuum over my carpet. It's just not a very sturdy vacuum but I thought I was getting a good deal with the price. I will be replacing this one with a Shark soon.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: bad
customer_reviews.text: this isn't that good has a bad smell like it is burning will n:t buy again
customer_reviews.author: yim

customer_reviews.title: Just stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Have had this vacuum for 1 mth and 5 days..I have used it 3 times..it wont turn on..just stopped..nothing.. Not the greatest vacuum to begin with..but to just stop after a month!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great suction, cord not long enough.
customer_reviews.text: First time using was impressed with suction. For those who claim it won't stand upright, I suggest stepping where the picture of the foot is and pushing handle toward front. You won't hear an audible click but it will stay in position. A longer cord would be much appreciated. Update. After using vacuum for some time I'm very impressed with the unit. Good suction I love all the attachments it's lightweight and easy to empty. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love this little vac. It works just as good as my old one which was much larger and harder to move around with. I've been using it for some time now and am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: LOIS

customer_reviews.title: A+++++
customer_reviews.text: I love this little vacuum...it works like a dream...light weight, great suction, easy to clean and much cheaper than my past vacuums that didn't work near as good. So thanks a lot for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: terran paquette

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 cats and I did not realize how bad they were shedding until I could see it with this vacuum. I also didn't realize how poorly my old vacuum was working. The first time I used this I had to vacuum one room twice because of how much I was picking up. It's amazing and a great value! I love that I was able to just have it delivered to the house so there was no fighting with fitting it into the car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This thing really sucks! In a good way lol it gets up so much dirt that you wouldn’t even have known was down there. I have cats so this is a lifesaver.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Oderinde

customer_reviews.title: Will never trust this product again!
customer_reviews.text: Used it once and it doesn't work. Contacted manufacturers and was told that they were not responsible for damaged product!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Olszewski

product_meta.title: Dirt Devil Endura Reach Upright Bagless Vacuum Cleaner for Carpet and Hard Floor, Lightweight, Corded, UD20124, Red
product_meta.description: Style:Compact Upright| Size:VacuumThe Endura Reach is packed with powerful suction to tackle dirt anywhere in your home with the power of the improved Endura filtration system. A compact design with a quick-release wand gives you 10ft of extra cleaning reach making it easy to clean any mess, while the multi-floor brush roll cuts through dirt on carpet and hard floors. Enjoy the convenience of the easy-empty dirt cup which gets rid of the dirt with one touch of a button and reach any corner with the 2-in-1 dusting brush and crevice tool. Dirt Cup Capacity: 1.5 Liters, Grip Type: D-Shaped Handle, Handle Material: Plastic, Motor Amps: 8 Amps, Motor Volts: 120 Volts.
feature_bullets: NO LOSS OF SUCTION - The Endura filter is equipped for powerful upright vacuum cleaner performance – it’s also easily accessible + rinsable for quick maintenance when you need it
EASY-EMPTY 1. 5L DIRT CUP – Fewer, quicker, and easier trips to the trash, all with the touch of a button
LIGHT WITH A BITE – This compact upright packs some serious multi floor cleaning power in a conveniently lightweight design
QUICK & EASY REACH – Power through dirt and pet hair with a wave of the extension wand for 10 ft. of extra reach - which stores on the vacuum when you’re done
WHAT'S INCLUDED? – A 2-in-1 dusting brush and crevice tool stores on-board for messes at a minute’s notice

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars2,850 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: 2-in-1 Dusting brush, Crevice tool, Dirt Devil Endura Reach Bagless Upright Vacuum
